content:
Yes, the mix of different fairy tale stories in "Into the Woods" is definitely a highlight of the show. The blending of these stories helps to bring a new perspective to familiar characters and themes, while also allowing the show to explore its central messages in a unique and creative way. 

Additionally, the humor in the show is a great way to balance out the heavier themes and keep the audience engaged. The show uses witty one-liners and clever wordplay to not only entertain the audience but to also convey its messages in a more lighthearted way. This helps to keep the show accessible and enjoyable for audiences of all ages and backgrounds.
